1	中文	\N	Zhōngwén	Chinese language	noun	\N	\N	语言	Language	\N	\N	\N	zhong1wen2.mp3	May refer to
2	繁体	繁體	fántǐ	traditional characters	noun	\N	\N	语言	Language	\N	\N	\N	\N	\N
3	中	\N	zhōng	in / amongst	preposition	\N	\N	虚词	Function Words	\N	\N	\N	zhong1.mp3	a note
4	文	\N	wén	writing / language / culture	noun	\N	\N	文化	Culture	\N	\N	\N	wen2.mp3	\N
5	繁	\N	fán	complicated / many	adjective	\N	\N	特点	Characteristic	\N	\N	\N	fan2.mp3	\N
6	体	體	tǐ	body / form / style / system	noun	\N	\N	种类	Category	\N	\N	\N	ti3.mp3	\N
7	简	簡	jiǎn	simple	adjective	\N	\N	特点	Characteristic	\N	\N	\N	jian3.mp3	\N
8	简体	簡體	jiǎntǐ	simplified characters	noun	\N	\N	语言	Language	\N	\N	\N	\N	\N
9	中	\N	Zhōng	China	proper noun	国家	Country	地理	Geography	中国	China	\N	zhong1.mp3	\N
10	前	\N	qián	in front of / before	adjective	\N	\N	位	Position	\N	\N	\N	qian2.mp3	\N
11	不见	不見	bùjiàn	to not see / to not meet	verb	\N	\N	观察	Observation	\N	\N	\N	bu2jian4.mp3	\N
12	古人	\N	gǔrén	people from ancient times / the ancients / person who has passed away	noun	\N	\N	历史	History	\N	\N	\N	gu3ren2.mp3	\N
13	不	\N	bù	not / no	adverb	否定	Negation	虚词	Function Words	\N	\N	\N	bu4.mp3	不 is used for simple negation, as opposed to 没, which is used for existence. The use is similar in both modern and literary Chinese. (Pulleyblank 1995, p. 103) For example, 不可，直不百步耳，是亦走也。'They 14 not do so. Though they did not run a hundred paces, yet they also ran away.' (Meng 1.3/1/26, translation by Legge)
15	见	見	jiàn	to see / to meet	verb	\N	\N	观察	Observation	\N	\N	\N	jian4.mp3	Often used as a complement of result meaning to hear, to see, to meet, etc through that action.
16	古	\N	gǔ	ancient / old / palaeo-	adjective	\N	\N	时间	Time	\N	\N	\N	gu3.mp3	\N
17	人	\N	rén	person / people	noun	\N	\N	人	People	\N	\N	\N	ren2.mp3	\N
